channel.title: Hardcoding the IP
channel.description:
alright well people cant connect to my server because i think its ip problems do you have to hardcode an ip if so how!?!? i have done the whole no-ip thing on the tut but that doesnt help much alls i need is this and i also need to know how to change in Project16 when u first logon "Welcome to Wolf's Project16!" ive changed everything in client.java to my name and all...i also need to know how to make the golden crwn next to my name when i speak... ive made my player rights 3/3 but it doesnt work..1 more thing is ::help brings up a help menu and it says admins, Wolf, Vodka and something else and i dont want any of that..........last thing is how do i get the ancient spells?! i have the extra tab thing but its like another inventory....LAST THING I PROMISE!!!! when i try to make my own thing thats ::admin and i copy like all the exact same stuff from like ::barrows (which works) and try it in game i did all the correct codes and all and compiled it......it doesnt work it doesnt even say anything... >.> please help!!!! -.- <3 anyone that can answer my questions...
~thanx Mike :D

item.title: Hardcoding the IP
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56

item.title: Hardcoding the IP
item.dc:creator: @mikedimuro mikedimuro
item.description:
@mikedimuro wrote:

alright well people cant connect to my server because i think its ip problems do you have to hardcode an ip if so how??? i have done the whole no-ip thing on the tut but that doesnt help much alls i need is this and i also need to know how to change in Project16 when u first logon “Welcome to Wolf’s Project16!” ive changed everything in client.java to my name and all…i also need to know how to make the golden crwn next to my name when i speak… ive made my player rights 3/3 but it doesnt work…1 more thing is ::help brings up a help menu and it says admins, Wolf, Vodka and something else and i dont want any of that…last thing is how do i get the ancient spells?! i have the extra tab thing but its like another inventory…LAST THING I PROMISE!!! when i try to make my own thing thats ::admin and i copy like all the exact same stuff from like ::barrows (which works) and try it in game i did all the correct codes and all and compiled it…it doesnt work it doesnt even say anything… >.> please help!!! -.- <3 anyone that can answer my questions…
